thread.title: Amplifi Commerce Expands US Presence to Atlanta
thread.title_full: Amplifi Commerce Expands US Presence to Atlanta

author: admin
title: Amplifi Commerce Expands US Presence to Atlanta
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/22/2015 @ 7:10 AM   Amplifi Commerce 
DALLAS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Amplifi Commerce, a digital transformation consultancy that helps the world’s leading brands thrive in today’s always connected society, is proud to announce the opening of its new Atlanta, Georgia offices. Headquartered in Dallas, Texas, Amplifi Commerce currently has offices in New York, Los Angeles, Chicago, and Bangalore, India. 
Amplifi’s new Atlanta office shows the company’s commitment to thoughtful expansion to support growing client needs in the US while providing convenient and professional office environments for their most important asset, their people. This office will be initially occupied by their rapidly growing Master Data Management (MDM) practice, but will soon house digital transformation consultants from all Amplifi Commerce practice areas. This prime office location is located in the Atlanta Galleria connected to the Cobb Galleria Convention Center between downtown Atlanta and Marietta, less than a half hour from the Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport (ATL). 
This expansion will play a key role in the company’s continued growth due to Atlanta’s thriving market for consulting and technology talent. Amplifi has a strong core team already in place and plans to continue hiring heavily to expand its MDM capabilities while ultimately expanding across all solution areas within the company. 
“We have had remarkable growth in the US by delivering highly effective MDM solutions and strategies for clients in the area,” said Corey Mellick, President and CEO of Amplifi Commerce. “Atlanta will serve as a hub for our MDM practice and is an ideal location for us to acquire and grow top talent within the region. We expect to invest significantly within this market and are thrilled to be a part of this great city.” 
For more information about Amplifi Commerce, Master Data Management, or additional Digital Transformation offerings, contact us toll free at (888) 963-9309 or email sales@amplificommerce.com . 
About Amplifi Commerce 
Amplifi Commerce is the leading provider of digital transformation service enabling the most recognized brands in the world to navigate and thrive in today’s digital economy. The company’s professional service divisions focus on Business Strategy, Omnichannel Commerce, Digital Experience Management (DEM), Master Data Management (MDM), Digital Performance Marketing (DPM), Business Intelligence (BI), and Managed Operations that make a measurable difference for leading brands across the globe; including Barnes & Noble, charming charlie, Claire’s, Fox Head, Jenny Craig, lululemon, Stage Stores, and Nintendo.
